title: 81/929/EEC: Commission Decision of 9 November 1981 approving an amendment to the outline programme under Council Regulation (EEC) No 269/79 for certain Mediterranean areas of France (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 9 November 1981 approving an amendment to the outline programme under Council Regulation (EEC) No 269/79 for certain Mediterranean areas of France (Only the French text is authentic) (81/929/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The amendment of the outline programme for Mediterranean areas of France, submitted by the French Government on 15 April 1981 pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 269/79, is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 November 1981.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 38, 14.2.1979, p. 1.  (2) OJ No L 322, 18.12.1979, p. 29.
